#summary Singleton pattern in JavaScript

= JavaScript Singleton =
{{{
var Singleton = (function()
{
	/* Private methods */
	var find = function()
	{
		alert('Private method find()');
	}
	
	return {
		/* Public methods */
		get: function()
		{
			find();
		}
	}
})();
}}}

= Example =
{{{
Singleton.get();
}}}
